subj-group.subject: RE-ORIENTALISM: GERMAN INDOLOGY STUDIES BEYOND FOUCAULT AND GADAMER

title-group.article-title: “Either a Hermeneutical Consciousness or a Critical Consciousness”
title-group.subtitle: Renegotiating Theories of the Germany-India Encounter
